reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As mentioned by others, the location couldn't be better. It was a quick walk from the train station with our luggage to the hotel. We arrived early, just before 8am and our room was ready. What a welcome for 2 tired travellers. Staff were great and very helpful. Our room was very small, to be expected, but it was also very dark and tired. Thankfully they changed towels during our stay, they were so old and threadbare, I wasn't sure they'd last a couple of showers. Overall for it's location, helpful staff, if you're just looking for a place to sleep not a bad hotel.
reviews.title: Great location, bit tired

reviews.text: The Hotel staff were excellent, so helpful and polite,especially the lady on reception, (high praise for her).
reviews.title: Best western, dam square

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel is in a Great central location, it is clean and spacious, (3 of us stayed in a room, )I have no faults with this hotel,
reviews.title: clean, basic, no frills, great location

reviews.text: Location couldn't be better - walking distance to Central Station, close to Dam Square, trams and canals. Staff were great - pleasant and knowledgeable. Hotel was full on our arrival (0700 - early flight). Reception provided access to toilets, luggage storage for the day, walking plan of the city, suggestions for ways to spend the day. We checked at 1400. Room we had requested (quiet - interior courtyard) was ready. Room was pretty basic but clean and airconditioned. Bed was softer than we prefer...Breakfast was advertised as continental, but included hard boiled egg, sliced meats and cheeses, tea, coffee, juice - much better than expected.
reviews.title: Right in the Heart of the Town

reviews.text: Good value for money, we thought.
reviews.title: A place to lay your head for the night, but not a destination
Excellent location!
reviews.text: The location of the gotel is ideal to cover all the main points of the city. The staff is very polite and helpful. However our room in the second floor (don't rebember the number) needed a change of mattress and a deep cleaning of the carpet!!!!

Depending on what you are looking for, this could be a great hotel for you in Amsterdam. It is not a 5 star luxury resort. It is a small, clean, well located hotel. The staff was excellent. They gave me great recommendations for a walking tour of the town, and stayed out of my way when I didn't want to talk to them. My room on the first floor was simple, but clean, and the Wifi worked.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: On a side note, there is a great bar just down the street with a fine selection of Belgian beers.
reviews.title: Perfect location and reasonable price

reviews.text: Dam Square hotel is ideally located just off the main square on a pretty narrow street with cafes and restaurants. It is a short walk to the shops, Amsterdam museum, station and the red light district.
reviews.title: Great location & Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is perfectly clean and the staff are very helpful and pleasant. We booked Dam Square in at the last minute when our original hotel proved unpleasant. It was the same price but so much better in every way.
reviews.title: GREAT LOCATION and WONDERFUL STAFF

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just stayed here and were quite pleased with the hotel. Hilka was very helpful for all our needs. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The breakfast was very adequate.
reviews.title: Location, Staff and Comfort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was right next to Dam Square and yet it was very quiet at night.
reviews.title: Perfect Location, Perfect Comfort

reviews.text: We were able to walk to many places right from the hotel. I would stay there again .
reviews.title: Best location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We couldn't have been happier with our stay in Amsterdam. We were able to walk the short distance to the hotel dragging our luggage (shades of Venice)! Our hotel was in the very center of things right off Dam Square. We were able to walk to all the sites, feel part of everything going on & still get a good night's sleep for a reasonable price. Our room was at the front of the house & quite spacious compared to some of the interior rooms. During the day we could enjoy the street sounds but things closed up early in the evening so our sleep wasn't disturbed. The beds (twins pushed together as a king) were so comfortable we found we were sleeping 10 hours / night -- unheard of! All the staff was terrific & had no difficulty with working in English. We enjoyed the complementary breakfasts each morning to start our day off well. I found the small elevator frustrating sometimes but it is insignificant given the overall service in the hotel.
reviews.title: Amsterdam Revisted

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent location in the heart of Amsterdam.
reviews.title: Great location!

reviews.text: Great location, Central to train station, Buses, canal tours, major sites. Nice lobby, good breakfast. Our room had no view, but was very quiet (As we requested) and had good Wi-Fi. We had three in our room and would stay here again.
reviews.title: Beautiful large antique orange doors,great location, quiet room.

reviews.text: We had a change of plans during our holiday and had to find a hotel at extremely short notice in Amsterdam - we received an excellent rate for a very comfortable room in walking distance of the train station. We have an 8 year old and booking directly with the hotel he was free in the fold down third bed in the room, which was a bonus for us.
reviews.title: Well appointed rooms and a very friendly, efficient staff

reviews.text: The receptionist was very friendly and helpful. The room was very modern and well appointed with everything you need. The beds were comfortable and the breakfast was extensive. We had an inside courtyard room and it was very quiet.
reviews.title: Very convenient

reviews.text: The position is down a small side street which had character. The downside for us was the number of people smoking directly in front of the hotel and at all the tables on the small street. The hotel itself is completely nonsmoking but the street was so narrow it was hard to avoid. I know this is not an issue for many people but it was for us.
reviews.title: Central yet very quiet and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would have given this hotel five stars as the staff, rooms, breakfast and room rate were all excellent, however, because of location as a family hotel I don't think it is perfect.
reviews.title: Clean comfortable and EXCELLENT!!!!
